document_data.caption: One example of a duhlarkin.
document_data.name: Duhlarkin
document_data.mainbody: A '''duhlarkin''' was any creature created through the use of the ''[[Duhlark's animerge]]'' [[spell]].
document_data.Description: Since ''Duhlark's animerge'' allowed the caster to fuse two different creatures into one new creature that possessed physical traits of both, the description of a duhlarkin varied greatly.
document_data.Combat: The type of physical attacks that a duhlarkin was capable of depended on the physical attributes it acquired from its "parent" creatures.
document_data.Society: The general behavior of a duhlarkin was similar to that of the dominant creature used during its creation. A duhlarkin was capable of reproducing by mating with either of the creatures it was related to. The offspring from these unions were stillborn a quarter of the time, resulted in a duhlarkin a quarter of the time, and resulted in the pure creature half of the time. A pair of mating duhlarkins would result in a stillborn half of the time and duhlarkin half of the time.
